original_text: All the king's servants, and the people of the king's provinces, do know, that whosoever, whether man or women, shall come unto the king into the inner court, who is not called, there is one law of his to put him to death, except such to whom the king shall hold out the golden sceptre, that he may live: but I have not been called to come in unto the king these thirty days.
korean_text: 왕의 신하들과 왕의 각 지방 백성이 다 알거니와 남녀를 막론하고 부름을 받지 아니하고 안뜰에 들어가서 왕에게 나가면 오직 죽이는 법이요 왕이 그 자에게 금 규를 내밀어야 살 것이라 이제 내가 부름을 입어 왕에게 나가지 못한 지가 이미 삼십 일이라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: and the people of the king's provinces
that whosoever, whether man or women
shall come unto the king into the inner court
there is one law of his to put him to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 죽이는 한 가지 법이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: except such to whom the king shall hold out the golden sceptre
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 금 홀을 내밀어주는 사람은 제외하고

sentences.original_text: but I have not been called
to come in unto the king
